faq.question: How does the subscription work?
faq.answer: You choose a plan (2 or 4 visits per month). Each visit is scheduled in advance and documented with a detailed photo report.

faq.question: What exactly does a visit include?
faq.answer: We check the interior and exterior: doors, windows, humidity, electricity, pool, garden, mailbox. Any issues are reported immediately.

faq.question: What happens if there is a problem?
faq.answer: You are notified immediately (WhatsApp, email, or phone call). We can intervene directly or call in our trusted local providers (plumber, electrician, gardener, pool technician).

faq.question: Can I cancel easily?
faq.answer: Yes. Our subscriptions have no commitment. You can cancel anytime with a simple email, no hidden fees.

faq.question: Who has access to my home?
faq.answer: Only our authorized and identified staff intervene. Each intervention is logged and confirmed with a report for full transparency.

faq.question: What about security?
faq.answer: Each visit includes a full check of alarms and access points. In case of anomalies, we notify you immediately and take necessary action.

faq.question: Do you also provide cleaning, pool, garden services?
faq.answer: Yes. We directly handle monitoring. For additional services (cleaning, pool maintenance, gardening), we use our trusted partners at preferential rates.

faq.question: How am I billed?
faq.answer: You are billed monthly by SEPA direct debit or credit card via Stripe. Your invoices are available online anytime.

faq.question: What if I only come in the summer?
faq.answer: Even if you rarely occupy your property, we provide regular monitoring to avoid unpleasant surprises (leaks, humidity, vandalism).

faq.question: Do you also work with real estate agencies?
faq.answer: Yes. We offer a white-label service: we perform the visits and checks for your clients, but you remain their contact person.
